message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I understand your perspective, $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  Let's split the difference and make this deal work.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $9,000 to $10,500, so I'll offer $9,750. Can you consider this price?
